A data transfer object (DTO) that encapsulates pagination metadata for cursor-based pagination in API responses. This class provides navigation information and optional count data for paginated results.

## Key Components

- **nextCursor/previousCursor** - Base64-encoded cursors for navigating between pages
- **hasNext/hasPrevious** - Boolean flags indicating availability of additional pages
- **totalCount** - Optional total item count (may be expensive to calculate)
- **currentPageSize** - Number of items in the current page
- **Lombok annotations** - Provides builders, getters/setters, and constructors
- **Swagger annotations** - API documentation with examples

## Usage Example

```java
// Building pagination info for API response
PageInfo pageInfo = PageInfo.builder()
    .nextCursor("eyJpZCI6MTIzNDU2fQ==")
    .previousCursor("eyJpZCI6MTIzNDU1fQ==")
    .hasNext(true)
    .hasPrevious(false)
    .currentPageSize(20)
    .totalCount(1500L)
    .build();

// Typical usage in paginated API response
public class ApiResponse<T> {
    private List<T> data;
    private PageInfo pageInfo;
    // ...
}
```

This class supports efficient cursor-based pagination where clients use opaque cursors rather than offset/limit parameters, providing better performance for large datasets.
